entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
